ygData.subject: Re: WAaahooo!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Most noticable when someone charged their Jbooties - and appropo - imho! Sylly ... From: Kimes, Dean W.  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Most noticable when someone charged their Jbooties - and appropo - imho!

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 11:47 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] WAaahooo!!


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Hmm, never noticed that. Always had so much trouble making sure I was
> stopped before casting I never ran until I was sure I was done. Even so,
> who has ever heard a complaint about that animation difficulty?
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]

> The spellcasting animations continue for a few seconds after
> you've completed casting the spell. Before the patch, folks
> who cast a spell and immediately started running would appear
> to glide just like we did.
>
